description: NASA’s Perseverance rover captured a rare pre-dawn image of Mars’ moon Deimos on Sol 1433, stitching together 16 long-exposure shots into a 52-second composition. Despite image noise and cosmic interference, the photo reveals Deimos, stars like Regulus and Algieba, and Martian sky conditions, highlighting the rover’s expanding role in celestial observation beyond geology and surface exploration.
title: NASA’s Perseverance Captures Deimos Before Dawn in Striking Martian Sky Image

description: A groundbreaking study has set a new lower bound on the mass of ultralight bosonic dark matter particles—2.2 × 10⁻²¹ eV. Using stellar motion data from the dwarf galaxy Leo II and advanced computational models, the team ruled out lighter masses that cannot form observed structures. This challenges the popular fuzzy dark matter theory and paves the way for exploring mixed dark matter models, marking a major step in narrowing down the true nature of dark matter.
title: New Study Sets Stronger Mass Limit on Ultralight Bosonic Dark Matter

description: A spectacular 600,000-mile-long solar filament erupted off the sun’s surface in a fiery blast captured on video. While the resulting CME will miss Earth, experts are watching closely as solar activity ramps up toward Solar Cycle 25’s peak. The event underscores the sun’s ongoing volatility and potential for more powerful outbursts ahead.
title: Sun Unleash a 600,000-Mile Filament in Fiery Eruption

description: Huawei MateBook Fold Ultimate Design was launched in China on Monday alongside the Huawei Nova 14 series of smartphones. The foldable laptop comes with a flexible OLED screen with up to an 18-inch 4:3 real estatae. It uses LTPO technology, which is claimed to be a first in a laptop.
title: Huawei MateBook Fold Ultimate Design With 18-Inch Double-Layer Flexible OLED Display Launched: Price, Features

description: Acer unveiled the AI TransBuds alongside the Acer FreeSense Ring and e-mobility products, including e-scooters, e-bikes, and accessories at Computex 2025. The TWS earphones are seen with an ear-hook-like design in a black colourway. The AI TransBuds have been teased to support AI-backed live translations in 15 major languages spoken across Asia, the Americas, and Europe.
title: Acer AI TransBuds With Ear-Hook Design Unveiled at Computex 2025

description: At least six lawsuits have been filed against Coinbase following a cybersecurity incident that led to a breach of user account data, a report by CoinTelegraph claimed on Monday. The plaintiffs have said that Coinbase failed to train its employees adequately that led to the incident.
title: Coinbase Faces Multiple Lawsuits After User Data Breach: Report

description: Dubai's Virtual Assets Regulatory Authority (VARA) introduced changes to its crypto policies aiming to increase risk oversight and ensure investor security. The policy changes focuses on deploying more control around margin trading and token distribution services among others.
title: Dubai's VARA Sets June 19 Deadline for Crypto Firms to Comply With Updated Activity-Based Rulebooks

description: Honor has disclosed the launch date of Honor 400 and Honor 400 Pro in China. The Chinese tech brand has shared new teasers online, revealing the battery and chipset details of the series. Both smartphones will offer significantly larger capacity batteries than their predecessors and will run on Snapdragon chipsets. The Honor 400 series launch will take place on May 22 in markets outside China.
title: Honor 400 Series China Launch Date Revealed; Confirmed to Offer Battery Upgrade Over Predecessors

description: Huawei Nova 14 Ultra, Nova 14 Pro and Nova 14 have been launched in China on Monday. The new Nova series smartphones run on HarmonyOS 5.0 out of the box and house 5,500mAh battery units that support 100W fast charging. The Huawei Nova 14 Ultra and Pro variants pack a 50-megapixel RYYB variable aperture primary camera and dual selfie shooters. One of the main highlights of the Huawei Nova 14 Ultra is the presence of a 50-megapixel RYYB periscope telephoto sensor.
title: Huawei Nova 14 Ultra, Nova 14 Pro, Nova 14 With 5,500mAh Battery, 100W Charging Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Microsoft has already spent $64 billion (roughly Rs. 5,46,718 crore) this year, much of it on data centers needed for AI-based services such as Copilot used in its popular Microsoft 365 applications. But there are signs that Microsoft is reworking its relationship with OpenAI and seeking to become a neutral arms dealer in the AI race.
title: Microsoft Hosts Developer Conference as Focus Grows on AI Profits

description: Nintendo Switch 2 will support text-to-speech functionality and live captions for its GameChat feature for in-game communication. Nintendo has also clarified variable refresh rate support on Switch, confirming the display feature will only be available in handheld mode.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 to Support Text-to-Speech in GameChat, VRR Support Limited to Handheld Mode

description: Xiaomi will launch its highly-anticipated YU7 electric sports utility vehicle on Thursday. Xiaomi began manufacturing EVs last year with the launch of the SU7 sedan after selling smartphones, household appliances and smart gadgets for most of its 15-year history.
title: Xiaomi to Launch 'Tesla-Challenging' YU7 on Thursday

description: Acer has unveiled the Acer FreeSense Ring at the Computex 2025 conference in Taipei. Acer's first-ever health-tracking smart ring comes in two different colour options and seven sizes. The Acer FreeSense Ring features a Titanium alloy build and comes equipped with multiple biometric sensors to monitor heart rate, heart rate variability, blood oxygen levels, and sleep patterns.
title: Acer FreeSense Ring With AI-Powered Health Tracking Features Unveiled in Seven Size Options

description: Acer launched several Copilot+ PCs at Computex 2025 in Taiwan on Monday. The company has introduced three laptops as part of its lineup — Acer Swift Go 14 AI, Swift Go 16 AI, and Swift Edge 14 AI, powered by up to Intel Core Ultra 9 processors. The Swift Go 16 AI and Swift Go 14 AI are introduced as thin-and-light laptops with features like improved Acer Multi-Control Touchpad for enhanced control. Meanwhile, the Acer Swift Edge 14 AI sports a 14-inch 3K OLED edge-to-edge glass display and comes with Corning Gorilla Matte Pro surface treatment on top.
title: Acer Swift Go 14 AI, Swift Go 16 AI Copilot+ PCs Launched at Computex 2025 Alongside Swift Edge 14 AI

description: Computex kicks off Monday in Taipei, and as in years past will draw industry chieftains from Huang and Qualcomm’s Cristiano Amon to Young Liu of Foxconn, which makes the bulk of the world’s iPhones and Nvidia servers.
title: Computex 2025: Beyond Nvidia, Four Things to Know at Asia’s Biggest Tech Show

description: Uber on Monday announced the rollout of metro ticketing on the Uber app. The Open Network for Digital Commerce (ONDC). Beginning today, Uber users in the national capital will be able to purchase QR-based tickets, and access real-time transit information, within the Uber app.
title: Delhi Metro Ticketing Goes Live on Uber App; More Cities, B2B Logistics Up Next

description: CERT-In has warned of multiple high-severity security flaws in Google Chrome for Desktop, potentially exposing numerous users. Google has since released patches to address the vulnerabilities. The Indian cybersecurity agency has urged all individuals and organisations using Chrome on Windows, Mac, and Linux to update to the newest version to safeguard against potential exploits.
title: Google Chrome Security Flaws Could Grant Hackers Unauthorised System Access: CERT-In

description: Google quietly released the ML Kit GenAI application programming interface (API) last week, allowing Android developers to build apps that leverage the capabilities of Gemini Nano. As per a document added to its developer forum, the Mountain View-based tech giant is now letting developers access the image description feature of the artificial intelligence (AI) model as well.
title: Gemini Nano-Enabled API Released to Android Developers Ahead of Google I/O 2025

description: Realme P3 5G series was unveiled in India earlier this year. The base and Ultra variants were launched in the country in March, while the Pro and P3x handsets were introduced in February this year. In an upcoming summer sale campaign, the company is extending lucrative discount offers on the P3 lineup of smartphones. The offers are inclusive of bank offers and discount coupons.
title: Realme P3 5G Series to Receive a Limited Period Discount in India: Offers, Availability

description: Vivo S30 series will include a base Vivo S30 and a Vivo S30 Pro Mini variant. Alongside announcing the launch date, the company has revealed the design, key features and colour options of the phones. They will be accompanied by the Vivo Pad 5 tablet, the Vivo TWS Air 3 earphones and a new 33W power bank with an inbuilt cable.
title: Vivo S30, S30 Pro Mini Launch Date Set for May 29; Vivo Pad 5, TWS Air 3 to Tag Along

description: Google I/O 2025, the company's annual developer conference, will kick off on Tuesday and we can expect the company to announce new AI-powered features coming to Gemini AI, Google search, and Project Astra, as well as additional details related to the Android 16, Wear OS 6, and Android TV 16 updates at the Google I/O live event.
title: Google I/O 2025: From AI to Android XR, Here's What to Expect From Google's Annual Developer Conference on May 20

description: HP OmniBook 5 series artificial intelligence (AI) AI PCs were launched at Computex 2025 on Monday. The latest AI-powered PCs are powered by Snapdragon X and Snapdragon X Plus processors, coupled with a dedicated neural processing unit (NPU) which is claimed to deliver up to 45 tera operations per second (TOPS) of computational power.
title: HP OmniBook 5 Series AI PCs With Snapdragon X Series Chipsets Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Realme GT 7T is all set to go official in India and other global markets on May 27. Ahead of its official unveiling, the design of the new GT series smartphone has been leaked online through alleged renders. The leaked renders give us an early look at the colour options as well. The Realme GT 7T is tipped to come with a 6.8-inch display with a 120Hz refresh rate. It is said to run on a MediaTek Dimensity 8400 Max processor.
title: Realme GT 7T Leaked Renders Suggest Design, Colour Options; Said to Get MediaTek Dimensity 8400 Max SoC

description: Gadgets360 had a word with Rajeev Singh, Managing Director of BenQ India & South Asia, on the emerging trends in the Indian market and overall company strategy. Few of the responses have been edited and shortened for ease of understanding.
title: Home Projector Market to Double In Next 4 Years, South and West Key for BenQ India: Rajeev Singh

description: iQOO Neo 10 Pro+ will be launched at its upcoming event in China, alongside a number of new devices, including a tablet, a smartwatch, and TWS earphones. The upcoming iQOO Neo 10 Pro+ has been showing up in leaks and rumours lately, but with the launch just a day away, iQOO decided to make its battery-related details official along with some interesting claims.
title: iQOO Neo 10 Pro+ Battery, Charging Specifications Revealed; Will Be Equipped With 6,800mAh Battery

description: Red Dead Redemption 2, the acclaimed action-adventure title from Rockstar Games, will reportedly join the long list of third-party titles set to release on Nintendo Switch 2 in 2025. The game will also reportedly get a next-gen patch on PS5 and Xbox Series S/X.
title: Red Dead Redemption 2 Reportedly Coming to Nintendo Switch 2 in 2025 Alongside Next-Gen Patch

description: Microsoft is reportedly planning to adopt Anthropic’s Model Context Protocol (MCP) to let multiple artificial intelligence (AI) agents work together. As per the report, the Redmond-based tech giant said that it is focusing on multi-agent workflows and improved memory capability of its agents. The adoption of Anthropic’s MCP standard could be announced at the Microsoft Build 2025, scheduled for Monday.
title: Microsoft to Support Anthropic’s Model Context Protocol to Power Multi-Agent Workflows: Report

description: Xiaomi Civi 5 Pro is set to launch in China in May. The handset will likely be unveiled on May 22, during Xiaomi's 15th anniversary launch event. The company has confirmed several key features of the upcoming smartphone, including chipset, battery, display and camera specifications. The design and colour options of the phone have been revealed as well.
title: Xiaomi Civi 5 Pro Design, Key Features Revealed; Likely to Launch on May 22

description: The overall crypto market cap slipped by 0.50 percent in the last 24 hours. Bitcoin and Ether, both registered notable losses on Monday. Tether, Ripple, and Solana followed BTC and ETH into losses. Meanwhile, Monero and Leo managed to log minor gains.
title: Bitcoin Price Drops Below $103,000 Amid Ongoing Market Uncertainty

description: Marathon is embroiled in a plagiarism controversy after an independent Scottish artist said the game used assets from her work without her permission. Developer Bungie, which has been accused of plagiarism several times before, acknowledged the incident on Friday and claimed a former staff member was responsible for the artist’s work appearing in the game uncredited.
title: Bungie Conducting 'Thorough Review' of Marathon After Artist Accuses Studio of Plagiarism

description: Epic Games asked a court to force Apple to approve access to the hit game Fortnite in the US App Store. On Wednesday, Epic pulled its initial submission after not hearing back from Apple and resubmitted it with updated content to match the game on other platforms.
title: Epic Games Asks Court to Force Apple to Approve Fortnite on US Store

description: Microsoft is said to be rolling out a new feature for Phone Link on Windows which lets users have a quick glance at their messages, calls, and more from the Start Menu itself. Although the feature was officially announced in the first week of May, users are now reportedly receiving it with the latest Windows 11 update. It adds a dedicated panel for Phone Link in the Start Menu, enabling users to get a quick view of their phone’s recent calls, notifications, messages, and more.
title: Microsoft's Phone Link Panel Arrives on Start Menu With Support for Android Devices: Report

description: OnePlus 13s will be launched in India and the global markets in the first week of June, the company announced on Monday. It is set to be introduced as the China-based OEM’s first ever-compact flagship smartphone, powered by the flagship Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset. Confirmed to be available in three colourways, the upcoming OnePlus handset will be equipped with a Cryo-Velocity vapour chamber for efficient heat dissipation and is claimed to deliver up to 24 hours of continuous use on a single charge.
title: OnePlus 13s India Launch Date Set for June 5; Specifications, Colourways Teased Ahead of Debut

description: Xiaomi 15s Pro will be launched in China later this week. The Xiaomi Pad 7 Ultra and the company's latest electric car, Xiaomi YU7, will be launched alongside the new smartphone. Xiaomi's new self-developed chipset, Xring 01 SoC, will be announced during the event. The Xiaomi 15s Pro is confirmed to be the first phone to ship with this new chipset.
title: Xiaomi 15s Pro, Xiaomi Pad 7 Ultra, Xiaomi YU7 Launch Date Announced; XRING 01 Chipset Spotted in Geekbench

description: Apple will refrain from unveiling major Siri upgrades at WWDC 2025 next month, according to a Bloomberg report. Instead, the tech giant will reportedly focus on refining current Apple Intelligence features and introducing a few new ones with the iOS 19 update later this year. The company faced delays in rolling out advanced Siri capabilities unveiled at WWDC 2024.
title: Apple Unlikely to Discuss Siri Upgrades at WWDC; to Be Wary of Unveiling New Features in Advance: Report

description: iPhone 17 Air (or Slim) is believed to go official in September alongside the standard iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max models. The new Air model, likely the thinnest iPhone ever, is said to replace the iPhone 16 Plus this year. As the anticipation builds for the upcoming iPhone 17 Air, a new leak hints at its battery capacity, weight, and thickness. The iPhone 17 Air is said to be thinner than Samsung's Galaxy S25 Edge
title: iPhone 17 Air Said to Be Thinner Than Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge; Battery Capacity Leaked

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE may launch in select global markets later this year. A recent leak claimed that the purported handset will likely come with an upgraded selfie camera over the current Galaxy S24 FE, which has a 10-megapixel front sensor. A new report now suggests that the Galaxy S25 FE could retain the telephoto and ultrawide shooters of the existing Fan Edition phone.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE May Get Similar Telephoto, Ultra-Wide Cameras As Galaxy S24 FE; Launch Timeline Tipped

description: Truth or Trouble is a Hindi reality show premiering on JioHotstar on May 19, 2025. Hosted by Harsh Benniwal, the show features participants confronting their past secrets with a gripping mix of drama, humor, and suspense. Early buzz suggests it will be a bold and entertaining watch.
title: Truth or Trouble Now Streaming on JioHotstar: What You Need to Know About New Hindi Reality Show Hosted by Harsh Benniwal

description: Google has been rumoured to be developing a new dedicated first-party desktop mode for Android phones and tablets for years now, and it may be closer to launch than ever before. As per a new leak, the feature, dubbed Android Desktop Mode, was previously expected to arrive with Android 16 this year but may now see its release with Android 17. It is speculated to offer capabilities similar to Samsung DeX and Motorola Connect, enabling users to resize windows and quickly transition between a mobile and desktop interface.
title: Android Desktop Mode to Reportedly Debut With Android 17 on Pixel; May Offer Multitasking Capabilities

description: Apple is said to move away from making any significant upgrades to AirPods till 2026. The company refreshed its AirPods lineup last year with the introduction of AirPods 4 — a product which also finally brought active noise cancellation (ANC) to the base TWS earbuds. However, the story for this year may not be the same. Next year, the iPhone maker is tipped to introduce a new product in the form of AirPods with a built-in infrared (IR) camera.
title: Apple AirPods With Built-in Camera Said to Launch Next Year; No Major Upgrades Till 2026
